Description: Lower body and tall conical foot sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style, pottery chalice; white slip; wholly glazed save underside; inscription on underside.
Curator's comments: The number in Petrie's catalogue, '42', is written in pencil on the underside of the foot. For parallels regarding Chalice Style chalices, see Lemos no. 929 from Tocra.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 41)
Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (p. 170, no. 9)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1082) (phase 2)
